name: armis
label: Armis
description: Armis connector protects from cyber threats created by the onslaught of unmanaged IoT devices. This connector facilitates operations to get alerts and devices list, update the status of alerts, tag, and untag devices.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: server_url
fields.description: URL of the Armis server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: API Key
fields.name: api_key
fields.description: API key to access the Armis endpoint to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description:
Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified. 
By default, this option is set to True.

operations.title: Get Alerts List
operations.description: Retrieves a detailed list of alerts from the Armis server based on filters like Alert ID, Time Frame, Risk level, and other criteria that you have specified.

parameters.title: Alert ID
parameters.name: alert_id
parameters.tooltip: Specify an alert ID to retrieve the specified alert's details from the Armis server.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify an alert ID to retrieve the specified alert's details from the Armis server.

parameters.title: Time Frame
parameters.name: time_frame
parameters.tooltip: Specify the time frame to retrieve the alerts from the Armis server. By default, the time frame is 1 week.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the time frame to retrieve the alerts from the Armis server. By default, the time frame is 1 week.

parameters.title: Risk Level
parameters.name: risk_level
parameters.tooltip: Select risk levels to filter alerts retrieved based on your selection.
parameters.description:
(Optional) Select risk levels to filter alerts retrieved based on your selection from the following options:  

High 

Medium 

Low

parameters.title: Status
parameters.name: status
parameters.tooltip: Select the status to filter alerts retrieved based on your selection.
parameters.description:
(Optional) Select the status to filter alerts retrieved based on your selection from the following options:  

UNHANDLED 

SUPPRESSED 

RESOLVED

parameters.title: Alert Type
parameters.name: alert_type
parameters.tooltip: Select the alert type to filter alerts retrieved based on your selection.
parameters.description:
(Optional) Select the alert type to filter alerts retrieved based on your selection from the following options:  

Policy Violation 

System Policy Violation 

Anomaly Detection

parameters.title: Max Alerts
parameters.name: max_alerts
parameters.tooltip: Helps in limiting response to a specified number of alerts.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the maximum count of alerts that you want this operation to return in the response.

operations.title: Update Alert Status
operations.description: Updates the status of a specific alert on the Armis server based on the alert ID and the alert status that you have specified.

parameters.title: Alert ID
parameters.name: alert_id
parameters.tooltip: Specify an alert ID to update its status on the Armis server.
parameters.description: Specify an alert ID to update its status on the Armis server.

parameters.title: Status
parameters.name: status
parameters.tooltip: Specify the status of the alert to update on the Armis server.
parameters.description: Specify the status of the alert to update on the Armis server.

operations.title: Get Alerts By Armis Standard Query
operations.description: Retrieves a detailed list of alerts from the Armis server based on the Armis Standard Query that you have specified.

parameters.title: Armis Standard Query
parameters.name: query_string
parameters.tooltip: Specify the Armis Standard Query to retrieve alerts from the Armis server based on your specified query.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the Armis Standard Query to retrieve alerts from the Armis server based on your specified query.

parameters.title: Max Alerts
parameters.name: max_alerts
parameters.tooltip: Helps in limiting response to a specified number of alerts.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the maximum count of alerts that you want this operation to return in the response.

operations.title: Add Tags to a Device
operations.description: Adds tags to a Device based on the device ID and tag name that you have specified.

parameters.title: Device ID
parameters.name: device_id
parameters.tooltip: Specify a device ID to which to add tags on the Armis server.
parameters.description: Specify a device ID to which to add tags on the Armis server.

parameters.title: Tags
parameters.name: tags
parameters.tooltip: Specify a comma-separated list of tags to add to the specified device.
parameters.description: Specify a comma-separated list of tags to add to the specified device.

operations.title: Remove Tags from a Device
operations.description: Removes tags from a Device based on the device ID and tag name that you have specified.

parameters.title: Device ID
parameters.name: device_id
parameters.tooltip: Specify a device ID from which to remove tags on the Armis server.
parameters.description: Specify a device ID from which to remove tags on the Armis server.

parameters.title: Tags
parameters.name: tags
parameters.tooltip: Specify a comma-separated list of tags to remove from the specified device.
parameters.description: Specify a comma-separated list of tags to remove from the specified device.
